author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chief Minister N. Rangasamy laid the foundation stone to construct a 2.5 lakh litre capacity overhead water tank and 1 lakh litre capacity ground level water tank at an outlay of Rs.1.53 crore at Keezhagraharam near Villianur on Wednesday.

Mr. Rangasamy said the work will be taken up by the PWD and residents of Keezhagraharam and surrounding areas would get protected drinking water in the next six months. Mangalam MLA C. Djeacoumar and PWD officials participated.

A 2.5- lakh litre capacity OHT and a 1-lakh litre capacity ground level water tank will be built
title: Rangasamy lays foundation stone for water tanks
